name: Jimmy Cash
dialogue: Congrats on getting elected mayor, Mrs Gatberg. I'm Jimmy and I'll be your financial advisor. I want you to grow this town and make us rich!

name: Allena
dialogue: We also want to make sure the environment is healthy. If this reaches number reaches 0, I'm sure our town will be destroyed by a natural disaster and we wouldn't want that.

name: James the Dog
dialogue: Woof! Woof! [When the town happiness number hits 0, you will be voted out of office]
